name: Extreme Speed
description:
1. This game uses unreal 4 engine.

2. This game adopts PBR material.

3. This game can play LAN games.

4. The picture quality can be changed in this game.

5. The game can turn on the frame rate.

6. The game can switch languages.

7. This game can change the resolution.

8. This game can start vertical synchronization.

9. Players can switch between different maps.

10. Players can switch between different racing cars.

11. Players can switch between the first person perspective and the third person perspective.

12. Players can drive the car to drift.

13. Players can drive the car to release nitrogen.

14. Players can set player names.

15. Players can reset the car.
